name: AMZCHEF Cold Press Juicer Machines, 4.5-inch Wide Feeding Chute Fit Whole Fruits & Vegetables juicer, Two Upgraded Filter, High Yield Juice, 250W Power, Easy to Clean, Black

other_info.Special Feature: Powerful Motor, Whole Fruit Processing, Stainless Steel Housing, Quiet Motor

about_this_item: 4.5-inch Large Diameter Feed Chute: Introducing our juicer with spacious 4.5-inch large feed chute designed for whole fruits and vegetables. Say goodbye to tedious chopping while masticating and increase your juicing efficiency with this time-saving feature.

250W Powerful Cold Press Motor: Equipped with a robust 250W motor, our juicer machines combines cold press technology with raw power. Slowly rotating at 50rpm, it ensures minimal oxidation, preserving the natural enzymes and nutrients in every glass.

Dual Filter System: Our AMZCHEF juicer included two filters designed for different produce. One for softer fruits and the other for harder vegetables, ensuring every fruit or vegetables have a versatile and efficient juicing.

Silent Operation at 60 Decibels: Our AMZCHEF juicer's slow masticaing technology allowed you enjoy quiet kitchen time with our juicer that operates at a mere 60 decibels. Unobtrusive juicing means no more early morning or late-night disturbances.
Easy Assembly with Rotation Lock: Our juicer is designed for user convenience with a simple, secure rotation lock mechanism. Few parts mean quick assembly and disassembly, making cleaning a breeze.
